dmca.title: [ABUSE] WARNING - FORMAL LEGAL NOTICE
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 10, 2005 11:17 AM
To: Gameloft Content Protection Team
Cc: wecare@vermaparivaar.com; Jerome Sibade; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] WARNING - FORMAL LEGAL NOTICE

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

Gameloft Content Protection Team wrote:
| Dear Sir, or Madam,
|
|
|
| Our Content Protection Team has reported that you are hosting a web
| site: http://www.spotok.com/ which offers copies of Gameloft's games for
| mobile phones, on the following links:
|
|
|
|
|
| Prince Of Persia Sands Of Time:
|
| http://www.spotok.com/tiki-download_file.php?fileId=2481
|
|
|
| Rayman 3:
|
| http://www.spotok.com/tiki-download_file.php?fileId=236
|
|
|
|
|
| Gameloft hereby declares to be the owner of the copyright or
| intellectual property rights in and to the Gameloft's games located on
| the web site http://www.spotok.com/ and it has not autorized the use of
| the Gameloft's games on such web site. The making of unauthorized copies
| is a violation of Gameloft rights under French laws and International
| Treaties.
|
|
|
| You have participated in the violation of law, or, at best, you have
| been negligent in preventing others from offering unauthorized copies of
| Gameloft's games on the internet. You are potentially liable for damages
| that Gameloft may suffer as a result of this violation of law. Damages
| could be significant, given the wide distribution of pirate copies over
| the Internet.
|
|
|
| We hereby formally request that you immediately remove or ask to remove
| Gameloft's games from the web sites: http://www.spotok.com/  and confirm
| the same by email.
|
|
|
| This letter constitutes notice to you that your actions are illegal and
| may subject you to criminal prosecution and civil liability. We will be
| monitoring your web site to see if you are in compliance with the law
| and reserve the right to take all steps necessary to protect Gameloft's
| rights.
|
|
|
| Regards,
|
|
|
| GAMELOFT S.A.
|
|
|
| "I hereby declare that I am duly authorized to act on behalf of
| Gameloft. I certify under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true
| and correct."
|
|
|
|
|
| ------------------------------
|
| Content Protection Team
|
| piracy@gameloft.com
|
|
|
